data.actual_result: The app crashes, note, it crashes faster when entering larger servers.
data.expected_result: The app will either Freeze, black out, or flicker and show the default android crash dialogue
data.short_description: Essentially, over the course of the week my Galaxy S4 (4.2.2 OS) is consistently crashing on the Android Alpha app.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up app - enter semi large to large server for faster results
